title: 'Struggling Frank trapped in gilded cage at joyless Tottenham'
summary: Struggling head coach Thomas Frank is trapped in a gilded cage at joyless Tottenham Hotspur, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.

title: Real Madrid youngster Garcia scores hat-trick in place of Mbappe
summary: Watch highlights as Real Madrid beat Real Betis 5-1, with 21-year-old striker Gonzalo Garcia, starting in place of the injured Kylian Mbappe, scoring a hat-trick.

title: Leeds 'devastated' as fan dies at game with Man Utd
summary: Leeds United say they are "devastated" after a supporter died before their Premier League game against Manchester United on Sunday.

title: Thelin 'accepts' Aberdeen sacking after winless run
summary: Aberdeen sack manager Jimmy Thelin following a five-match winless run and just eight months on from the club's Scottish Cup win.

title: 'I accept this decision' - Thelin sacked by Aberdeen
summary: Aberdeen sack manager Jimmy Thelin following a five-match winless run and just eight months on from the club's Scottish Cup win.

title: Radwan double helps Leicester triumph over Saracens
summary: Adam Radwan scores two tries as Leicester Tigers edge closer to The Prem play-off places with a 36-28 win over Saracens at Welford Road.

title: 'It's not enough'- Slot frustrated with Fulham draw
summary: Liverpool manager Arne Slot says "it's not enough" for his side to rely on late goals after a "frustrating" 2-2 draw against Fulham at Craven Cottage.

title: I will do my job for 18 months and then we move on - Amorim
summary: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim says that in 18 months' time, when his contract is due to end, he will leave, repeatedly stating that he came to "manage" the club, not just to be a coach.
